name: techlaunch.io
description: Website for the Techlaunch coding school at the Florida Vocational Institute

scripts.build-css: npm run sass && npm run autoprefixer
scripts.build-css-min: npm run sass && npm run autoprefixer && npm run minify-css
scripts.deploy: git add . && git commit && git push origin master
scripts.build-deploy: npm run prod && npm run build-css-min && npm run deploy
